questions: Is there an old man in a fabric smock splattering paint in the image?
Is there a young man in wooden goggles and an oversized t-shirt in the image?
Does the image present a differentiation logic: an old man in a smock splattering paint alongside a young man in an oversized t-shirt and goggles?
Is the smock made of fabric?
Are the goggles made of wood?
model_output:
yes The image shows an old man wearing a fabric smock that appears to be splattered with paint.
no There is no young man in wooden goggles and an oversized t-shirt visible in the image.
no The image does not show both an old man in a smock splattering paint and a young man in an oversized t-shirt and goggles; it only features the old man.
yes The smock worn by the old man appears to be made of fabric.
no The goggles mentioned are not present in the image; therefore, they cannot be made of wood.
